backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with authorization, blob storage mixins, and numerous types for articles, profiles, subscriptions, journals, and related data models.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise descriptions of key frontend files, components, and pages for reference or documentation.
frontend/deploy/nginx/site.conf: Example Nginx configuration for serving the built frontend with caching, security headers, and SPA routing.
Systemd service file to run the frontend's Nginx static server with security hardening options.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining production deployment steps, checks, and procedures for promoting a reviewed build.
frontend/docker-compose.yml: Docker Compose configuration for building and running the frontend container with health checks.
frontend/Dockerfile: Multi-stage Dockerfile that builds the frontend with pnpm and serves it via Nginx.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables, dark mode variants, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/LINUX_HOSTING.md: Instructions for deploying the frontend on Linux via Docker, Docker Compose, or direct Nginx hosting.
frontend/nginx/default.conf: Default Nginx config for the production frontend container, including caching, security headers, and SPA fallback.
frontend/offline-bundle/assets/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the assets directory in version control.
frontend/offline-bundle/css/styles.css: Defines the layout, typography, color variables, and component styles for the offline bundle UI including header, hero section, buttons, and responsive navigation.
frontend/offline-bundle/fonts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the fonts directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/hero-illu: SVG illustration depicting a sunrise landscape with hills, plants, and a tractor for the hero section.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/journal-p: SVG placeholder graphic showing a stylized journal with lines and an emblem.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/logo.svg: SVG logo featuring a leaf-like central icon with accent shapes and circular background.
frontend/offline-bundle/index.html: Main offline landing page containing navigation, hero section, informational sections, and form placeholders for the Agrigence site.
frontend/offline-bundle/js/app.js: Handles mobile navigation toggle, smooth scrolling, demo form submissions, and section-based navigation highlighting.
frontend/offline-bundle/README.md: Instructions for using the offline static website bundle by opening index.html locally.
frontend/project/admin.html: Admin panel page structure including user management tables, profile views, payment and submission controls, and logout handling UI.
frontend/project/assets/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the assets directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/project/css/main.css: Defines global styles, color variables, layout utilities, form elements, buttons, and UI components for the app.
frontend/project/dashboard.html: Provides the user dashboard layout, including profile display/editing, photo upload controls, and linked dashboard sections.
frontend/project/index.html: Contains login and registration UI, including forms, validation fields, and navigation between auth views.
frontend/project/js/admin.js: Implements admin functionality such as authentication checks, user search, viewing/editing user details, and updating submissions.
frontend/project/js/auth.js: Handles authentication logic including login, registration, password reset, session management, and admin access checks.
frontend/project/js/dashboard.js: Manages the dashboard experience with profile viewing/editing, password changes, photo uploads, and loading user-specific data.
frontend/project/js/db.js: Provides seed data and localStorage-based database utilities for users, payments, submissions, and sessions, including admin credential migration.
frontend/project/js/main.js: Initializes page-specific logic, handling authentication redirects and login/register/forgot-password form events.
frontend/project/README.md: Documentation describing the offline journal portal features, authentication flows, admin tools, and usage instructions.
frontend/project/receipts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the receipts directory in version control.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the appâ€™s TanStack Router routes, React Query provider, theming, and global layout for all pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays a simple alert message indicating that the user lacks permission to view the page.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Renders a live countdown to the 25th of the current or next month using a repeating timer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with a submission countdown, contact info, social links, legal link, and visitor counter.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the top navigation bar with links, search, authentication controls, and responsive mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the global page structure including header, notice banner, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: A loading screen component with determinate and indeterminate progress modes, animating an SVG book and fading out when complete.
frontend/src/components/NoticeMarqueeBan: Displays a scrolling marquee of notice messages fetched from CMS config, rendering only when enabled and populated.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: A dialog form that collects user profile details and submits them via a mutation, showing validation and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupDialo: A dialog for entering Stripe credentials and allowed countries, validating inputs and saving configuration via mutation.
frontend/src/components/VisitorCounter.t: Tracks and displays a local visitor count using localStorage, incrementing on each page load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor functions such as profiles, banners, news, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, base typography, and custom utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders an About & Contact page with mission info, founder profiles, and a contact form with validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelContent.tsx: Large admin dashboard component handling news, blogs, journals, editorial members, terms, and banner management with many query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Checks admin status and conditionally renders the admin panel, loading state, error message, or access denied screen.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleSubmissionPage: Allows authenticated, subscribed users to submit article files with upload progress and validation.
Displays detailed author guidelines and publication policies, setting SEO metadata on mount.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the user dashboard, fetching profile, articles, and subscription status, and showing profile setup if missing.
frontend/src/pages/EditorialBoardPage.ts: Displays the editorial board list with photos, roles, and member details fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Provides a form for users to request a password reset, currently using a placeholder until backend support exists.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content and dynamically loaded news, blogs, magazines, reviews, and article previews.
frontend/src/pages/JournalsPage.tsx: Shows the current journal issue and an archive filtered by year, allowing users to download journal PDFs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with email/password placeholder auth plus Internet Identity login and admin check for routing.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays news and blog posts using tabs, fetching items from queries and rendering formatted cards.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeBoardPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure details with options to retry, contact support, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe session status, creates subscriptions on success, and displays loading, success, or error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup form with validation and placeholder email/password registration logic.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Displays subscription plans, handles Stripe checkout creation, and shows Stripe setup options for admins.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: React page that fetches and displays Terms and Conditions with loading, error, and styled content states.
frontend/src/utils/optimizeImage.ts: Client-side image optimizer that resizes, compresses, and converts images with a fallback to the original file if optimization fails.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Simple SEO helpers to set document title and meta description.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, features, issues, and new requests related to admin login redirection and social media link fixes.
